remarks: Double conjugation of a polynomial causes the coefficients to be conjugated.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)
statement:
plycj.1 $e |- N = ( deg ` F ) $.
plycj.2 $e |- G = ( ( * o. F ) o. * ) $.
coecj.3 $e |- A = ( coeff ` F ) $.
coecj $p |- ( F e. ( Poly ` S ) -> ( coeff ` G ) = ( * o. A ) ) $.
